Detailed Description

Handles the displaying of the Servers in the MainWindow.

Member Function Documentation

void View::addWindow ( Aki::IBaseWindow *  window  ) 

Adds the given window to the View.

Ownership is transferred.

If the View is empty before this function is called it will be set as the current window.

Parameters:
window Window to be added.

Definition at line 47 of file view.cxx.

Parameters:

Returns:
index if window is apart of View, or -1 otherwise.

Definition at line 95 of file view.cxx.

void View::insertWindow ( int  index,
Aki::IBaseWindow *  window 
)

Inserts the window in to the View, this transfer ownership of the window to the View.

If the index is out of range it will be append.

If the View was empty before this function is called, the window becomes the current widget.

Parameters:
index Index to be inserted at.
window Window to be inserted.

Definition at line 55 of file view.cxx.

void View::removeWindow ( Aki::IBaseWindow *  window  ) 

Removes the window from the View.

Note:
The ownership of window remains the same. The widget is not deleted, but simple removed from the view, causing it to hide.
Parameters:
window Window to be removed.
